article_title: Area Islamic community moved by faith to help uninsured patients

article_metadata.author: Seth Boster, Star Staff Writer, sboster@annistonstar.com

og.description: Their vision was to do what the pillars of their Islamic faith commanded them to do: serve their fellow people. They called it “salam,” meaning peace.
